casebody.data:
STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA
v.
KEVIN LAMONT BARKSDALE No. 7P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. J. Clark Fischer, Winston-Salem, for Barksdale. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th day of January 2007 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of June 2007."

HUDSON, J., recused.
